DatasetDefinition.Title: baseline_factors
DatasetDefinition.Description: This dataset provides information about the characteristics of the subjects in the study. It contains information about the outcome of each subject in the study as well as the time object used for the survival analysis.

Column.Description: Subject's Number, it has been anonymised by random transformation
Column.Name: a_subjectno

Column.Description: The subject's trial centre, it has been anonymised
Column.Name: a_centreno

Column.Description: Smoking status, asked at randomisation and used to stratify during randomisation
Column.Name: smoker

Column.Description: What the subject's trial status was at the end of the trial
Column.Name: trialstatusid

Column.Description: Days from randomisation of the last time the subject's trial status changed. If blank, the trial status did not change
Column.Name: trialstatuschangedate

Column.Description: Months from randomisation of the subject's diagnosis date
Column.Name: studydaymonthsfromdiagnosis

Column.Description: Family history of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)
Column.Name: familyhistoryibd

Column.Description: Days from randomisation of primary endpoint
Column.Name: studydayprimarydate

Column.Description: Time object used in the survival analysis
Column.Name: time

Column.Description: Changes in subject's trial status from different dataset than "trialstatusid"
Column.Name: statuschangedto

Column.Description: Days from randomisation of the subject's trial status changed from different dataset than "trialstatuschangedate"
Column.Name: studydaystatuschangedate

Column.Description: Days from randomisation of the subject's trial status combining "trialstatuschangedate" and "studydaystatuschangedate"
Column.Name: status_change

Column.Description: Days from randomisation of the subject's last visit
Column.Name: last_visit
